Understand Perspectives

Everyday, Vantage creates a digest of what's going on in the world. Scroll through the 6 - 12 stories of the day on your commute or during lunch to get up to date on current events. Within each story, you are presented with several articles from different news organisations who each write a different perspective on the same story.

Daily digest

We will present to you today's top stories, in a condensed fashion so you can understand current event's, then move on with your life.

Multiple perspectives

Understand the world from the eyes of multiple people to create a more balanced news diet.

Download it now

Vantage is available on both Android and iOS, keep in mind this is an early version.

About the creator

Hi. I'm Luca. I've worked on this all on my own so far. I ideated, designed, developed and marketed Vantage to make it what it is today. I've been programming and designing things since around the age of 12, and news has always something I've been passionate about.

While creating an app for myself that I want to use is fun, I want Vantage to be much bigger than just myself, and for that I need some help. I'm looking for any enthusiastic girls, guys or others to help build and flesh out Vantage in the months to come. If you're interested, please don't hesitate contact me, I don't bite.


Roadmap

Vantage for the web

Sometimes we're at our desks and we want to catch up on the news. Why not use the full real-estate of a desktop screen to understand different perspectives of today's news.

Top social posts

Not every perspective we read should come from established media outlets, it's important to see what the public is saying. Integrating the most interacted tweets and facebook posts is one concept we have to solve this.

Global stories

Our current sources tend to pull stories mostly from the UK and the US. To appeal to a worldwide user base it's important we incorporate news from all over the world.

New languages

Vantage currently only supports English, by expanding to different languages, the product can be more accessible to more people.

Comments and ratings

Interacting on particular stories within the app is something that could potentially be very interesting, it's a concept we wish to explore.

Potential redesign

While the current look and feel of Vantage has it's benefits, it is always worth looking at different concepts to display different perspectives.
